p: Due to an imperfect signal quantification, B 0 inhomogeneity, and the complicated J‚Äêmodulations of all lipid resonances, the calculated relaxation times should not be considered as true, but rather, as apparent T 2 relaxation times. 10, 15 For the sake of simplicity, we will use the term T 2 (relaxation) times for measured apparent T 2 relaxation times.
